comments.body: Late October is perfect for rabi wheat in Punjab. I recommend HD-2967 variety for your region.

replies.body: Thanks! Where can I get HD-2967 seeds?

comments.body: I've been using HD-2967 for 3 years. Great yield and disease resistance. Best sown between Oct 25-Nov 5.
This looks like anthracnose disease. Apply copper-based fungicide and improve air circulation around the tree.
Drip irrigation is excellent for tomatoes. Initial cost is high but water savings are significant.
